title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4560.8 - Provision for laundry facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4560.8 - Provision for laundry facilities

State Regulations

Mechanical clothes washers, laundry trays, tubs and sinks
shall be provided in the ratio of at least 1 for every 50 residents or fraction
thereof. Such facilities also shall have adequate provisions for drying
clothes. Notes

4560.8

Adopted

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/16/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
